# Programming Concepts

> Documentation for Programming Concepts.

*Topics available: 9*

- [Programming Concepts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/index.md): Use the resources in this section to understand programming concepts in the C# language, including object-oriented programming.
- [Iterate through collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/iterators.md): Learn how to use an iterator to step through collections like lists and arrays. Iterators are consumed from client code using a foreach statement or LINQ query.

## Subtopics

- [Covariance and Contravariance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/llms.txt): Topics available: 7; Covariance and Contravariance documentation and reference.
